name: COWBOY TOWN
description:
Lark is a cowboy trying to go about her daily life (showing off her sweet hat, etc) when her life is all shaken up by a gaggle of doppelgangers! Keep what's important to you close to your heart as you square off in trivia battles, and remember, THIS TOWN'S NOT BIG ENOUGH FOR THE TWO OF US..... Or is it?!

✨🎩🐮👢🤠✨

MUSIC CREDIT:

This game uses tracks from https://filmmusic.io :
"Aunt Tagonist" , "Awkward Meeting" ,  "Neo Western", "Shiny Tech", "Supernatural", and "Villainous Treachery- Distressed", by Kevin MacLeod ( https://incompetech.com )
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/c)

These Boots Are Made For Walking - Nancy Sinatra

Big Enough - Kirin J Callinan

✨🎩🐮👢🤠✨

This game was made in Unity with the Fungus extension!
